document.full_text: in 1874, it took the american society for the prevention of cruelty to animals to bring the case of a battered 10-year-old, mary ellen mccormack, before a new york court.
document.title: case shined first light on abuse of children
lines_and_colors: in 1874, it took the american society for the prevention of cruelty to animals to bring the case of a battered 10-year-old, mary ellen mccormack, before a new york court.
